speech: Meer water! Wat vind jij leuker, water of zonlicht?
Meer zonlicht! Wat vind jij leuker, water of zonlicht?
Meer water! Wat heb jij liever, water of zonlicht?
Meer ruimte! Wat heb jij liever, water of zonlicht?
Zonlicht. Dankjewel! Wat heb jij liever, water of zonlicht?
Compost! Wat heb jij liever, water of zonlicht?
More water! What do you like more, water or sunlight?
More light. What do you like more, water or sunlight?
More space. What do you like more, water or sunlight?
Sunlight. Thank you. Do you prefer water or sunlight?
Compost, please. Do you prefer water or sunlight?
